MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  We are arranging to have engineers investigate the fault, and we hope to have your electricity restored by 14-DEC-2020 19:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the TD9 postcode area of Hawick, affecting properties in Weensland Road and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have managed to restore some supplies but have a secondary fault on out network and are carrying out further investigations to locate and repair this secondary fault. We now expect your supply to be restored by 7.00pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.52pm on the 14th of December 2020.
